title: Borderlands 3 Being Announced Tomorrow - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.27.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/games

Get your trial set at http://harrys.com/gamesdaily

Borderlands 3 annoucement teased, Cyberpunk 2077's E3 gets hyped, and Wolfenstein Youngblood gets a release date!

Time Stamps - 
00:04:05 - Housekeeping
Vote for Greg https://twitter.com/ESPN_Esports/status/1110668081209229313
The Kinda Funny World Tour comes to Kansas City THIS Saturday. Come hang out with us all day at Planet Comicon for panels with the cast of Smallville, Mick Foley, and Henry Winkler! Then, come to our Meet & Greet at the Flying Saucer Draught Emporium! No badge needed for the Meet & Greet. NYC, you’re next on April 6th!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Tom Bock, and Mohammed Mohammed!
The Roper Report   -
00:06:04 - Borderlands Announcement Teased For Tomorrow
00:09:45 Best Friend Q. - With a Borderlands announcement on the way tomorrow, do
you guys anticipate that what we'll see will greatly differ from the Borderlands style we've come to know? - Gillybruns
00:14:13 Best Friend Q. - What do you think is the likelihood that Borderlands 3 releases day and date on Xbox Gamepass? - Robert Mimms
00:19:35 - Wolfenstein Youngblood Release Date (Owen S Good at Polygon)
00:21:38 -  Final Fantasy XV Studio Begins Work on Ne AAA Game (Shabana Arif on IGN)
00:24:00 - CD Projeckt Red News (Giuseppe Neva Twinfinite)
00:32:30 - Gwent Coming to Smartphones
00:32:37 - Yoshis’s Crated World Reviews Are In (Metacritic 80)
00:33:25 - Out today
00:38:58 -  Quip
00:40:15 -  Harry’s
Reader mail   -
00:42:02 - Assuming there is a PSVR 2, how likely do you think it is that it will launch the same year PS5 does? - Steven
00:47:46 - Am I missing something from the Stadia announcement that should get me hype? - James Alexander
00:53:20 - Squad Up: Carter (Twitch) - Ajteve
00:54:21 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Tim and Fran
